newsitem.title: USA: Gleason sees good equipment order momentum.
newsitem.headline: Gleason sees good equipment order momentum.

text.p: Gleason Corp said it is optimistic about order trends in several product lines.

The company said a large order for cylindrical gear products in early April puts its orders well ahead of the incoming order rate last year. It said it expected full year orders for the product line to be higher than last year.

Gleason said the growth outlook for its bevel gear products also remains promising. It cited increasing demand for light trucks and the need to replace the old installed base of equipment at many of its customers' plants as likely to sustain good order momentum for those products.
